meanings.sent1: The mishmash of toys on the floor made it hard to walk.
meanings.sent2: She created a mishmash of colors in her painting.
meanings.sent3: The mishmash of ingredients in the soup accidentally turned out delicious.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were a mishmash of memories and dreams.
meanings.sent5: The mishmash of sounds in the busy market was overwhelming.

meanings.sent1: The mishmash of flavors in the dish was surprisingly tasty.
meanings.sent2: The room was filled with a mishmash of furniture styles.
meanings.sent3: The mishmash of costumes at the party made it hard to recognize anyone.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were a mishmash of joy and sadness.
meanings.sent5: The mishmash of scents in the garden was delightful.
